metadata.name: AT2 GENIUS LTD 2023 SERIES | 1 / 7000
metadata.description:
The serialized NFTs present a 3D replica of the AT2 GENIUS LTD23 and ML10 PRO CUP LTD23 rackets, of the official players of the [NOX brand](https://noxsport.es); Agustin Tapia and Miguel Lamperti.
Created digitally with the highest level of detail, they faithfully reproduce each and every one of the original elements of the blades. Finally providing them with a light emission effect, which becomes the artistic element that gives them the added value for being the origin of the [unique NFTs](https://opensea.io/collection/metalemissive-unique-nfts-nox-collection) belonging to the MetalEmissive series. There are 7000 units in AT2 LTD 2023 Series and 3000 units in ML10 PRO CUP LTD 2023 Series. More info at [nft.noxsport.es](https://nft.noxsport.es)

attributes.value: 10% off for life in NOX products (in NOX online store)
